content:
Built for Wood, Auto Body, Metal & More From aggressive removal to mirror-finish polishing, our 9Ã—11 sheets deliver uniform scratch patterns and predictable results at every stage.
Why Pros Choose eQualle Wet or DryUse with water or dry for dust control and longer life. Fast Cutting SiCSilicon Carbide grains cut quickly and leave a fine, consistent scratch. Wide Grit RangeFrom P60 for heavy removal to P3000 for ultra-fine finishing. Trim-to-Fit9Ã—11 sheets fold or cut easily for blocks and detail sanders. Suggested Grit Sequence P60â€“P120 â€” Fast stock removal, leveling, stripping paint/rust. P150â€“P240 â€” Surface prep and between-coat sanding. P280â€“P400 â€” Fine finishing before primer/clear/varnish. P500â€“P2000 â€” Polishing, paint correction, plastics, resin. P2500â€“P3000 â€” Ultra-fine, high-gloss and mirror finishes. How to Use for Best Results What You Get Material: Silicon Carbide Abrasive (professional grade). Size: 9Ã—11 inches (fold, wrap, or cut as needed). Use: Wet or Dry â€” wood, auto body, metal, plastics, fiberglass, resin. Grits: P60â€“P3000 (availability varies by pack). Ready for a Smoother Finish? Choose your grit, sand with confidence, and get pro-level results on wood, metal, and automotive projects.
Shop Sandpaper â†’ Silicon Carbide Wet or Dry Use Pro Results Performance depends on surface type and sanding method â€” smooth results start with the right grit and steady technique.
summary: Fast-cutting, durable sheets for smooth, consistent finishes â€” Wet or Dry Use.
title: eQualle Sandpaper â€” 9x11 in Silicon Carbide Sheets

content:
We value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.
Information We Collect Basic information automatically collected by your browser (IP address, device type, browser type). Voluntary information you provide (such as when contacting us via email or forms). How We Use Information To provide and improve our website. To respond to your inquiries. To analyze site traffic and performance. Cookies Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
Third-Party Services We may use third-party services (such as analytics or embedded media). These services may collect their own data according to their privacy policies.
Your Rights You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us.
Updates We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page.
Effective Date: January 1, 2025
summary:
We value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.

Information We Collect

  • Basic information automatically collected by your browser (IP address, device type, browser type).
  • Voluntary information you provide (such as when contacting us via email or forms).

How We Use Information

  • To provide and improve our website.
  • To respond to your inquiries.
  • To analyze site traffic and performance.

Cookies

Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
title: Privacy Policy
